thread.title: Investors Pour Money Into Data-Center Properties

author: Esther Fung
title: Investors Pour Money Into Data-Center Properties
text:
Commercial real estate might be approaching a market peak, but one category is still raking in capital.
Investment volume in U.S. data centers more than doubled in 2017 to $20 billion, more than the combined total for the past three years, according to CBRE, a real-estate consultancy.
The bet: that large companies such as Amazon.com Inc. and...
